thread.title: Help for the Kashmir Tour in November 2015
thread.title_full: Help for the Kashmir Tour in November 2015

author: raj.rawool
title: Help for the Kashmir Tour in November 2015
text: India Mike » India Travel » States in India » Jammu & Kashmir » Help for the Kashmir Tour in November 2015 Help for the Kashmir Tour in November 2015 # 1 I would like to get some information about the Kashmir Tour in the month of November. I will be travelling to Kashmir from Mumbai in Mid November with my family. Will be staying in Houseboat in Srinagar. Will there be a room warmer in houseboat? Can I get Very warm woolan coat and other cloths on rent at srinagar? How is the food at Kashmir? Vegeterian food is available at Kashmir? My kids want to play in snow. Where can we get that type of snow to play around? Thanks
